channel.title: Auto cache downloader [Delta]
channel.description: Hello i need help to make a cache downloader for my delta so it downloads to c:/ please help me!

item.title: Auto cache downloader [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @coola99 coola99
item.description:
@coola99 wrote:

well how can i use this “jagchached”? [quote=“Wintercanon, post:6, topic:418739”][quote author=coola99 link=topic=521282.msg3787774#msg3787774 date=1319034954]
that looks hard isent there any other way i can do? or it works to make a jar file with the cache and that inside and make it to webclient?
[/quote]Nope I’m afraid there isn’t an easier way without hacking up the client to download the entire cache if it doesn’t exist (which would still be beyond your skills at this time). Graham’s JagCached is very elegant. No you cannot include the cache inside the webclient because the point of the cache is to cache the resources on the user’s local filesystem. It is what allows the game to be played at a bearable speed. It would be horrible if the server had to send you a sprite, model or another resource every time you needed it during gameplay.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Auto cache downloader [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“coola99, post:5, topic:418739”]that looks hard isent there any other way i can do? or it works to make a jar file with the cache and that inside and make it to webclient?[/quote]Nope I’m afraid there isn’t an easier way without hacking up the client to download the entire cache if it doesn’t exist (which would still be beyond your skills at this time). Graham’s JagCached is very elegant. No you cannot include the cache inside the webclient because the point of the cache is to cache the resources on the user’s local filesystem. It is what allows the game to be played at a bearable speed. It would be horrible if the server had to send you a sprite, model or another resource every time you needed it during gameplay.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto cache downloader [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @coola99 coola99
item.description:
@coola99 wrote:

that looks hard isent there any other way i can do? or it works to make a jar file with the cache and that inside and make it to webclient?[quote=“Wintercanon, post:4, topic:418739”]You need an update server. There isn’t a tutorial on adding automatic updating as it is quite advanced. Trust me, doing this is out of you grasp but I will point you in the correct direction: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=439647.0[/quote]

Read full topic
